content:
The Russians also used 2 Lancet UAVs and dropped 209 fragmental ammunition from the UAV of various modifications against the civilians against the civilian population of the frontal territories of Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhya and Kherson regions.

About thisreported March 26The forces of the South Defense.

During the Military Age, the occupiers made 7 aviation strikes by using 8 managed aviation and unmanaged aviation missiles in the Orikhiv direction.

2 Aviation strikes of 6 managed aircraft were directed to Mykilsky, Zmiivka and Red Lighthouse in Kherson region. The building of the village club, a shop, surrounding dwellings and a car were destroyed.

In the Kherson region, enemy troops hit the artillery in Kherson 2 times. Also under shelling were Berislav, Novoberislav, Antonovka, Oleksandrivka, Gavrilovka, Golden Beam, Burguna, Giant, Red Lighthouse, Dniprovske, Kizomis and Tyaginka.

Administrative buildings, private dwellings, outbuildings and civilian cars were damaged. There are no casualties among the population.

In the Dnieper region, the enemy fired at Nikopol and Chervonohrigorivka artillery. As a result of the criminal acts of the enemy during artillery shelling of the Dnipropetrovsk region, 1 civilian was injured. Private dwellings, transmission lines and gas pipelines were damaged.

In Zaporizhzhya, the enemy fired at the artillery Gulyaypole and a robot. A private dwelling house, an administrative building and a private car were damaged.

Asreported the armyinform, the aircraft of the Russian Federation struck the amounts.
title: In the south the enemy applied 270 FPV-roms against civilians
description: This was reported on March 26 by the forces of the South. During the battle era, the occupiers ...
author: Army Inform
